descriptions.manageServicePoints: Manage QR codes for tables, counters, and other service locations.
descriptions.createServicePoint: Create a new service point for your store. Each service point gets a unique QR code.
descriptions.createDescription: Create a new service point for your store. Each service point gets a unique QR code.
descriptions.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete this service point and its QR code. Any existing printed QR codes will stop working. This action cannot be undone.
descriptions.qrCodeDescription: Scan this QR code to access the menu from this service point.

placeholders.name: Table 5, Bar Counter, Main Entrance...
placeholders.description: Optional notes about this service point...

hints.urlCode: Used in the QR code URL. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.
hints.zone: Optional. Group service points to activate/deactivate together.

emptyStates.noServicePointsDescription: Create service points to generate QR codes for tables, counters, or any location where customers can order.
emptyStates.noAttributes: No attributes. Add key-value pairs to tag this service point.

toolbar.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, code, or zone...

filters.noResults: No service points match your filters

batch.title: Batch Create Service Points
batch.description: Create multiple service points at once with sequential naming.

hints.zone: Optional. Assign all created points to this zone.
